t: Best Smart Home Devices of 2025 - CNET
s: April 2, 2025 - At $80, Amazon Smart Thermostat is the least expensive smart thermostat we've tested. You'll need a compatible Alexa-enabled smart speaker or display to use voice commands, but you don't have to enable an Alexa skill as this is an Amazon-branded product.

s: Smart Home Products was founded with simplicity in mind. We make it easy to automate your home. Creating a smart home can be complex; with the all the different software systems, hubs, and requirements that might be needed – it becomes difficult to know where to start.
